name: Bitcoin Aliens
description:
Join Daniel D'Alien and kill aliens to earn REAL bitcoin, paid directly to your bitcoin wallet. The world's most popular free bitcoin app.

Bitcoin Aliens is a unique free bitcoin faucet where you KILL ALIENS to earn bitcoin!
Kill aliens indefinitely and conquer new planets in unique missions every 3 hours, with awesome bosses and massive payouts.

Every week we pay out all users with a registered bitcoin wallet address and a balance of at least 20,000 satoshi.

There is no gambling in this app, as there is nothing to spend money on. It's just a free game, that gives away free bitcoin.
It's classified as a contest/sweepstake app, as while you play this game, you get rewarded in bitcoin/digital currency.
Apple is not a sponsor and is not involved in any way with our rewards and giveaways.
We reserve the right to deny payouts to any users suspected of fraudulent activity.

Earn REAL BITCOIN by killing aliens in a fun game!
